= `Ord` -- Orderings


[#Ord_Ordering]
== `Ordering` (type)
A type to represent an ordering.



....
type Ordering = {  #lt;
  #eq;
  #gt;
};

....

[#Ord_isLT]
== `isLT`
Check if an ordering is less than.



[listing]
isLT : Ordering -> Bool

== `isEQ`
Check if an ordering is equal.



[listing]
isEQ : Ordering -> Bool
